name: PPE-Violation-Detection
desc: A deep learning model to detect PPE violations in workplaces using computer vision.

name: Multi_Person_Face_Recognition
desc: A face recognition system capable of identifying multiple persons in a single frame.

name: tindog-project
desc: A simple landing page for a fictional dating app for dogs, built using HTML and CSS.

name: Dice-Game
desc: A fun dice game where two players roll dice, and the player with the higher roll wins. Built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

name: Drum-Kit-project
desc: An interactive drum kit that plays different drum sounds when keys are pressed or buttons are clicked. Developed using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

name: simon-game
desc: A web-based version of the classic Simon game, where players must repeat increasingly long sequences of colors. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

name: weather-prediction-app
desc: A web application that provides weather forecasts for different locations. Utilizes APIs to fetch real-time weather data.
